SoftwareType.Name: Stream addon
SoftwareType.Description: Letting your streamers get cool features onto their streams!

Feature.Name: Base
Feature.Description: The base of where people can go see their opportunities

Feature.Name: Spam protection
Feature.Description: Protects your chat from any spam

Feature.Name: Commands
Feature.Description: Letting users to add different commands showing a cool description

Feature.Name: Giveaway
Feature.Description: Letting streamers create a giveaway and people can join with a command

Feature.Name: Song request
Feature.Description: Allowing users to request a song using a command!

Feature.Name: Follower alert
Feature.Description: This will notify your streamer that he got a new follower

Feature.Name: Donator alert
Feature.Description: This will notify your streamer about donations

Feature.Name: Stream labels
Feature.Description: Using text file this allows users to show who maybe is the latest donator or follower and maybe even add a top donators list

Feature.Name: Chat
Feature.Description: Letting your viewers to see a chat on the screen so they can stay fullscreened and follow the chat!
